channel.title: Showcase on Hello there!
channel.description: Recent content in Showcase on Hello there!

item.title: Local Music Playback Skill for MycroftAI
item.description: A skill/extension for the MycroftAI assistant that allows playback of downloaded mp3 files with MycroftAI (on Linux). Here’s the code.

item.title: J.P. Morgan Virtual Internship
item.description: I recently completed a ‘virtual internship’ lead by JP Morgan on InsideSherpa’s platform. Here’s the certificate of completion. I worked on some interesting tasks like: Interfacing with a stock-price data feed. Using JPMorgan Chase’s frameworks and tools. Displaying data visually for traders.

item.title: Breakout Game on the Micro:bit
item.description: A ‘breakout’ clone for the microbit. Probably the smallest (graphically speaking) version of the Breakout game, uses 25 pixels/leds (arranged as a 5x5 grid). This is the repo/python code. Check the releases for a hex file you can copy to your own micro:bit.

item.title: Randomly Generating Maze Game
item.description:
Uses a backtracking algo to generate new mazes each time the space bar is pressed. Space: New maze | Arrow keys: Move | Goal: Green triangle Note: Requires JavaScript.
Up Left Right Down New Maze
